local_intent: Verify visibility, prepare by opening gripper, align to the green_bottle, push it 10 cm at 0°, then retreat to a safe pose.
assumptions: ApproachAndAlign provides a safe approach path without explicit pre-push MoveAbove.
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence around the push: detect and verify target, open gripper, approach/align, push 0.10 m at 0°, then retreat. Omits MoveAbove while preserving push semantics and safety.
